Html:
It seems that the ToolTipTitle is not working when set from the RibbonMarkup.xml file on Menu Items.

You can seem sample 2 as an example, none of the Application Menu items have titles, even though they are set.

If you set the Title in the Form1.ctor() it does not apply either, but if you set it from the _buttonNew_OnExecute() it does apply.

 

Any insight on this?

It seems that if the LabelTitle and TooltipTitle are the same, the ribbon doesn't show the TooltipTitle.

I'm not sure if this is a bug or feature, but it's in the ribbon framework and not in the wrapper.
